page.title: 08SHOPPING IN GARFORTH
page.content: {Garforth Mainstreet}is 5OOm long and has a wide selection of{shops}from a newsagents to supermarkets. Specialist shops include home improvement stores, a sports shop, hairdressers, 4 video rental shops, a frozen food store, electrical shop, bicycle shop and pet shop. There are 5 estate agents, 2 banks and a post office. There are 3 chip shops and a chinese restaurant. On{Saturday}the stalls of{asmall open {market}occupy a carpark. After interviewing shoppers we found that because of it's friendly atmosphere Mainstreet attracts custom from other areas including{Crossgates, Kippax, {Micklefield}and{Leeds.}Most people found the shopping facilities adequate though some felt stores selling mens and childrens wear, books, curtains and a coffee shop would improve present amenities.
